member.summary: constructor

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NEnumPrinters (System.Text.StringBuilder, System.Int64 @)
member.summary: Get a list of printer names managed by the driver
member.param: Printer names (listed in csv comma separated format)

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NGetPrinterFromID (System.String, System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Get the printer name from the Bluetooth serial ID
member.returns:
Error: (0)
Normal: (Printer name storage area size)

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NDeletePrinter (System.String)
member.summary: Delete the printer name in the printer information management file

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NRenamePrinter (System.String, System.String)
member.summary: Used when rewriting the printer name in the printer information management file * In the Windows SDK, this function always returns N_ERR_NOTSUPPORTED (function not supported) (Android / iOS SDK only)

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NGetPrinterInf (System.String, System.Text.StringBuilder, System.Int64 @)
member.summary: Search the printer information management file from the printer name specified by the argument, Output path information-Returns the connection type * In the Windows SDK, this function always returns N_ERR_NOTSUPPORTED (function not supported) (Android / iOS SDK only)
member.param: Port information (listed in csv comma separated format)

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NAutoOpen (System.Int32)
member.summary: Turns on / off the automatic printer open function
member.returns: Current (after setting) automatic printer open setting status

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NOpenPrinter (System.String, System.Byte, NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NCALLBACK)
member.summary: Open the printer

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NClosePrinter (System.String)
member.summary: Close the printer

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NClosePrinters
member.summary: Close all printers

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NPrint (System.String, System.Byte [], System.UInt32, System.Int32 @)
member.summary: Sends the specified hexadecimal string data to the printer
member.param: Print job ID (can be specified as NULL)

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NDPrint (System.String, System.Byte [], System.UInt32, System.Int32 @)
member.summary: Sends the specified data to the printer (no conversion)
member.param: Print job ID (can be specified as NULL)

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NImagePrint (System.String, System.IntPtr, System.Int32, System.Int32, System.Byte, System.Int32 @)
member.summary: Sends the specified device context to the printer as a raster image
member.param: Print job ID (can be specified as NULL)

member.summary: Sends the specified BMP file to the printer as a raster image
member.param: Print job ID (can be specified as NULL)

member.summary: Sends the specified device context as a bit image to the printer
member.param: Print job ID (can be specified as NULL)

member.summary: Sends the specified BMP file as a bit image to the printer

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NResetPrinter (System.String)
member.summary: Reset the printer. The print job being printed is also canceled.

Normal: (Printer name storage area size)

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NBarcode (System.String, System.String, System.IntPtr, System.Int32, System.Int32, System.Int32, System.Int32, System.Byte [], System.Int32)
member.summary: The settings specified for the printer barcode font / 2D barcode font Draws a barcode / 2D barcode in the device context.

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NFirmwareDL (System.String, System.String, System.Byte, System.Int16 @, System.Int32 @)
member.summary: Sends the specified FWF file to the printer. If the FWF file is specified as NULL, the checksum is acquired from the printer and the checksum is acquired. Compares with the specified checksum.
member.param: fwf file name (null can be specified)
Print job ID (can be specified as NULL)

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NScanPrinters (System.UInt32)
member.summary: By executing this function, the printer enumeration request of the maintenance protocol is broadcasted. Receives the printer enumeration response and creates data for the millisecond (default 1000ms) specified by the argument i_waitmsec. The number of Wi-Fi printers obtained is stored in o_count. If 0 is specified, the printer enumeration request is not made and the number of created printers is returned as it is.
member.param: Number of milliseconds to wait from printer enumeration request to enumeration response / data creation

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NSetWriteSize (System.Byte, System.UInt32, System.UInt32)
member.summary: Set the transmission size and transmission interval (msec). Only supports Wi-Fi communication, and returns an error for other types.

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NTCPPortLock (System.String, System.Byte)
member.summary: Locks / unlocks TCP communication. Only the locked user can send data via TCP communication. Other users can connect but cannot send.

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NBufferClear (System.String)
member.summary: Clears the receive buffer (all buffers) It is supported only during Wi-Fi communication, and an error is returned for other types.

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NBlockSendSetting (System.String, System.Byte)
member.summary: The transmission data can be stored in the buffer of the Wi-Fi module and batch transmission can be performed. This function can switch ON / OFF of batch transmission.

member.name: M:NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NSetCallback (NPrinterCLib.NClassLib.NCALLBACK)
member.summary: Set the callback function
